snippet: Republicans have a habit of winning statewide elections nowadays, so the troubles of a candidate like Ken Paxton, running for attorney general, have not hurt him so far.
lead_paragraph: Republicans have a habit of winning statewide elections nowadays, so the troubles of a candidate like Ken Paxton, running for attorney general, have not hurt him so far.

headline.main: Facing the Law, but Running to Uphold It
headline.print_headline: Facing the Law, but Running to Uphold It
